text:
- [Narrator] These are
based on sugar cookies.

You know those cookies with
the sprinklings all over it?
That's right.
These are Sugar Cookie Shooters, homeboy.

So, we took that concept and
we pulled these out, you see.
Here's how we did it.

We start off by rimming our
glass in strawberry icing.
Okay, just to sexify the glass,
cuz icing makes everything look better.

Sometimes I put it on my
little mustache, you know.
Keep my sexy.

Ice, hit that with some
Vanilla Vodka, okay.

We come behind that Vanilla
Vodka with Cake Vodka.

Come behind that with
White Chocolate Liqueur
and then we end it
with a little bit of heavy whipping cream.
And give that a shake as we keep it sexy.
Pour that in your glass, that's our mix.

You leave a little bit of
space for whipped cream, okay?

'Cause whipped cream always
decorates and sexifies.

Come behind that with a
little mini Nilla Wafer.
You can use the large ones if you want,
but the minis are sexier.
Drop some sprinkles from the sky.

Okay, that'd be awesome
you walk down the street
and sprinkles dropping from the heavens
till it get in your eye.

Once they get in your eye,
then everything goes wrong.

And there you have it homeboys,
Sugar Cookie Shooters.
Stay tipsy, my friends.
Stay Tipsy.
(electronic music)
